name: Ice queen vs Flame Princess
description: While Ice and flame can’t be together both princess are famous girls from theirs lands. One of them got dressup which cleaner than snow and fresher than winter. Icy style is perfect and glow, but untouchable for others, or they will get frozen. The others princess dressup is pure flame, hotter than sunshine and brighter than diamond, and untouchable for others, if they don’t wish to be burn.  Don't forget icy crown and shoes for Ice Queen and flame sword for Flame Princess, bet you never tried such things before.
